ch0256_00_nezz/0101_0701_01_10:
Hey there, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Heading
out on another adventure today, are you?
ch0256_00_nezz/0101_0701_02_10: I’m cheering for you. Get out and enjoy yourself.
ch0256_00_nezz/7101_0701_01_10:
I may be a Gym Leader, but I’m also a bit of
a singer.
ch0256_00_nezz/7101_0701_02_10:
I hope to leave my Gym to my little sis someday
so I can focus on my music.
ch0256_00_nezz/7101_0701_03_10: But she has a dream of her own, too.
ch0256_00_nezz/7101_0701_04_10:
For now, I suppose I’ll just have to keep doing my
best at both.
ch0256_00_nezz/7102_0701_01_10: My little sis wants to be the Champion of Galar.
ch0256_00_nezz/7102_0701_02_10:
All the people who wanted to cheer her on came
together to form Team Yell.
ch0256_00_nezz/7102_0701_03_10:
They’re always coming to my concerts an’ cheering
for us. They’re a good lot.
ch0256_00_nezz/7103_0701_01_10:
You know about Dynamaxing? In Galar, there are
Power Spots that make Pokémon huge.
ch0256_00_nezz/7103_0701_03_10:
Battling without Dynamax is the way to go. It’s
what a real battle’s supposed to be like.
ch0256_00_nezz/7103_0701_04_10:
I’m gonna keep winning without Dynamaxing. 
Hopefully, it’ll bring back everyone’s smiles and
pride in our hometown.
ch0256_00_nezz/7104_0701_01_10:
Team Yell often come to my concerts to cheer us
on. It gets really lively when they’re around.
ch0256_00_nezz/7104_0701_02_10:
I’d like to return the favor, but all I can do as a
humble singer is continue singing humble songs.
ch0256_00_nezz/7104_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’m going to write the best song I can
while I’m here on Pasio.
ch0256_00_nezz/7104_0701_04_10: Once I get back to Galar, I’ll sing it for them.
ch0256_00_nezz/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you sing or play any instruments, 
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0256_00_nezz/7105_0701_02_10:
I’m curious. I bet you’d probably make some
rockin’ music.
ch0256_00_nezz/7105_0701_03_10: If you ever do write a song, let me hear it.
ch0256_00_nezz/1701_0701_01_10: Oh, there you are. I have something for you.
ch0256_00_nezz/1701_0701_02_10: Here, it’s a present from me to you.
ch0256_00_nezz/1701_0702_01_10:
If you use it well, I’m sure it’ll help you on
your adventures.
ch0256_00_nezz/2501_0701_01_10: I have a little sister. Her name’s Marnie.
ch0256_00_nezz/2501_0701_02_10:
She’s about as cute as they come. It might sound
like a bit of an exaggeration, but she’s important
to me.
ch0256_00_nezz/2501_0701_03_10:
I wonder what she’s doing now. I suppose she’s
doing all right.
ch0256_00_nezz/2501_0702_01_10:
If you ever meet Marnie, mind keeping an eye
on her?
ch0256_00_nezz/2501_0702_02_10:
She’s independent, but as an older brother, I
worry about her.
ch0256_00_nezz/2511_0701_01_10:
I’ve been wondering if my music can have a 
positive effect on my partner Pokémon through
sync stones.
ch0256_00_nezz/2511_0701_02_10:
You see, my partner Pokémon gets excited when I 
start singing.
ch0256_00_nezz/2511_0701_03_10:
If music’s the key to coming together an’
unleashing a powerful sync move, the better the
song, the stronger the move will be.
ch0256_00_nezz/2511_0702_01_10:
Once I finish a new song, I’ll test out my theory.
It’d be great if you could help me out with that
when the time comes.
ch0256_00_nezz/2511_0702_02_10:
You’re also the first person I want to listen to
my song.
ch0256_00_nezz/2511_0702_03_10: So that’s it. Sound good to you?
ch0256_00_nezz/3001_0701_01_10:
I like when it’s all quiet in the morning. Makes it
easier to come up with new melodies, y’know?
ch0256_00_nezz/3003_0701_01_10:
Battling’s always been a massive inspiration for
my songwriting. Some of my best riffs have come
from winning a good battle.
ch0256_00_nezz/3005_0701_01_10:
You ever think about how everything on this
island’s artificial? Well, except the stars—they’re
so metal, they’re in a class all of their own.
